name: Hangman Doodle
description:
How's your vocabulary? Put it to the test with this beautiful, light and casual Hangman Game!

The game has several categories and more than 60.000 selected words!

Choose between:
- All
- Animals
- Astronomy
- Cities
- Colors
- Countries
- Drinks
- Famous
- Foods
- Movies
- Names

Download Hangman Doodle and start having fun while learning right now!
